roles.name: member
roles.description: all users in org exclude public

operations.name: org-get
operations.description: get org information, parameter can be objectId or org path

operations.name: org-update
operations.description: update org information, same parameters to api of orgs/patch

operations.name: role-find
operations.description: find roles in org, if not specify org, use current org

operations.name: role-create
operations.description: create role in org, , if not specify org, use current org

operations.name: role-update
operations.description: update role in org, if not specify org, use current org

operations.name: role-delete
operations.description: delete role in org, can delete only when no user relate to role or no operation relate to role

operations.name: operation-find
operations.description: find operations, if not provide any params, find current org operations, can also use to find operations for role and find operation for user

operations.name: operation-create
operations.description: create operation in org, if not specify org, use current org

operations.name: operation-update
operations.description: update operation in org, if not specify org, use current org

operations.name: operation-delete
operations.description: delete operation in org, if not specify org, use current org

operations.name: operation-data-get
operations.description: should provide operation name to get operation data

operations.name: user-org-find
operations.description: find user's orgs, user has role(s) related to org

operations.name: user-role-find
operations.description: find user's roles in org (current or specified)

operations.name: user-role-create
operations.description: user can create role for self

operations.name: user-role-update
operations.description: user can update role for self

operations.name: user-role-delete
operations.description: user can delete role for self

operations.name: user-operation-find
operations.description: find user's operations in org (current or specified)
